work straight in st st until body measure 7 5 8 5 9 5 10 5 11 5 12 5 inches from underarm stitch markers tapestry needle one button work 12 row in garter sts then bobble notes sleeves please knit a gauge and wash it pick up the live sleeve sts from scrap yarn pick up and knit before starting to knit this cardigan is knitted top down the 8 cast-on sts under the arm pm join to work in the yoke and body are knitted flat round while the sleeves are knitted in the work 1 or 2 inches in st st work 6 row in garter sts bobble round the cardigan may be tried on finishing before you separate the sleeves add or remove few raglan wave in ends sew one button and enjoy increases if you need so pick up you favorite button once the cardigan is done ends waved have a wonderful day in and washed
